00020 //---------------------------------------------------------
00021 //   contextItem
00022 //---------------------------------------------------------
00023 
00024 void Canvas::contextItem(Element* el)
00025       {
00026       // _score->sel->elements.clear();
00027       switch(el->type()) {
00028             case ElementType(NOTE):
00029                   {
00030                   NotePropertyEdit np((Note*)el);
00031                   np.exec();
00032                   }
00033                   break;
00034             case ElementType(REST):
00035                   {
00036                   RestPropertyEdit rp((Rest*)el);
00037                   propertyObject = el;
00038                   rp.exec();
00039                   }
00040                   break;
00041             case ElementType(CLEF):
00042                   {
00043                   ClefPropertyEdit* cp = new ClefPropertyEdit((Clef*)(el));
00044                   propertyObject = el;
00045                   cp->exec();
00046                   }
00047                   break;
00048 
00049             case ElementType(MEASURE):
00050                   {
00051                   MeasurePropertyEdit* cp = new MeasurePropertyEdit((Measure*)(el));
00052                   propertyObject = el;
00053                   cp->exec();
00054                   }
00055                   break;
00056 
00057             default:
00058                   printf("type \"%s\" has no context\n", el->name());
00059             }
00060       _score->layout();
00061       }
00062 
00063 //---------------------------------------------------------
00064 //   NotePropertyEdit
00065 //---------------------------------------------------------
00066 
00067 NotePropertyEdit::NotePropertyEdit(Note* n)
00068   : NotePropertyBase()
00069       {
00070       note = n;
00071       QString sho, svo, st;
00072       Chord* chord = note->chord();
00073       Measure* m = chord->measure();
00074       int seg = 0;
00075       int tracks = n->score()->nstaves() * VOICES;
00076       for (Segment* s = m->first(); s; s = s->next(), ++seg) {
00077             int track;
00078             for (track = 0; track < tracks; ++track) {
00079                   Element* e = s->element(track);
00080                   if (e == chord)
00081                         break;
00082                   }
00083             if (track < tracks)
00084                   break;
00085             }
00086 
00087       segment->setText(sho.setNum(seg));
00088       xoffset->setText(sho.setNum(chord->userOff().x(), 'g', 3));
00089       yoffset->setText(svo.setNum(note->userOff().y(), 'g', 3));
00090       xpos->setText(sho.setNum(chord->pos().x(), 'g', 3));
00091       ypos->setText(svo.setNum(note->pos().y(), 'g', 3));
00092       tickpos->setText(st.setNum(chord->tick()));
00093 
00094       pitch->setValue(note->pitch());
00095       mirror->setChecked(note->mirror());
00096       tieFor->setChecked(note->tieFor());
00097       tieBack->setChecked(note->tieBack());
00098       ticks->setValue(note->chord()->tickLen());
00099       dots->setValue(note->dots());
00100       prefix->setValue(note->accidentalIdx());
00101       userPrefix->setValue(note->userAccidental());
00102       Chord* cr = (Chord*)(note->chord());
00103       voice->setValue(cr->voice());
00104 //TODO      move->setValue(cr->move());
00105       beamMode->setCurrentItem(cr->beamMode());
00106       beam->setChecked(cr->beam() != 0);
00107 //      grace->setChecked(cr->grace());
00108       stemUp->setChecked(cr->isUp());
00109       stemDirection->setCurrentItem(cr->stemDirection());
00110       graceNote->setChecked(cr->grace());
00111       tuplet->setChecked(cr->tuplet() != 0);
00112       connect(pitch, SIGNAL(valueChanged(int)), SLOT(pitchChanged(int)));
00113       connect(voice, SIGNAL(valueChanged(int)), SLOT(voiceChanged(int)));
00114       connect(beamMode, SIGNAL(activated(int)), SLOT(beamModeChanged(int)));
00115       }

00118 //   beamModeChanged
00119 //---------------------------------------------------------
00120 
00121 void NotePropertyEdit::beamModeChanged(int bm)
00122       {
00123       Chord* chord = note->chord();
00124       chord->setBeamMode((BeamMode)bm);
00125       chord->score()->layout();
00126       }

00132 void RestPropertyEdit::beamModeChanged(int bm)
00133       {
00134       rest->setBeamMode((BeamMode)bm);
00135       rest->score()->layout();
00136       }

00149 //---------------------------------------------------------
00150 //   pitchChanged
00151 //---------------------------------------------------------
00152 
00153 void NotePropertyEdit::pitchChanged(int newPitch)
00154       {
00155       Note* nNote   = new Note(*note);
00156       nNote->setSelected(false);
00157       Chord* chord = note->chord();
00158       int staff     = chord->staffIdx();
00159 
00160       nNote->setPitch(newPitch);
00161       note->score()->removeObject(note);
00162       note->score()->addObject(nNote);
00163 
00164       chord->measure()->layoutNoteHeads(staff);
00165       note->score()->undoOp(UndoOp::RemoveObject, note);
00166       note->score()->undoOp(UndoOp::AddObject, nNote);
00167 
00168       note->score()->layout();
00169       note = nNote;
00170       }

00172 //---------------------------------------------------------
00173 //   RestPropertyEdit
00174 //---------------------------------------------------------
00175 
00176 RestPropertyEdit::RestPropertyEdit(Rest* r)
00177   : RestPropertyBase()
00178       {
00179       rest = r;
00180       QString sho, svo, st;
00181 
00182       hoffset->setText(sho.setNum(rest->userOff().x(), 'g', 3));
00183       voffset->setText(svo.setNum(rest->userOff().y(), 'g', 3));
00184       tickpos->setText(st.setNum(rest->tick()));
00185       voice->setValue(rest->voice());
00186       beamMode->setCurrentItem(rest->beamMode());
00187       connect(beamMode, SIGNAL(activated(int)), SLOT(beamModeChanged(int)));
00188       }

00190 //---------------------------------------------------------

00192 //---------------------------------------------------------
00193 
00194 ClefPropertyEdit::ClefPropertyEdit(Clef* c)
00195   : ClefPropertyBase()
00196       {
00197       clef = c;
00198       int po = clefTable[clef->idx()].pitchOffset;
00199       QString spo, sho, svo, st;
00200 
00201       clsize->setCurrentItem(clef->small() ? 0 : 1);
00202       poffset->setText(spo.setNum(po));
00203       hoffset->setText(sho.setNum(clef->userOff().x(), 'g', 3));
00204       voffset->setText(svo.setNum(clef->userOff().y(), 'g', 3));
00205       tickpos->setText(st.setNum(clef->tick()));
00206       }

00208 //---------------------------------------------------------
00209 //   MeasurePropertyEdit
00210 //---------------------------------------------------------
00211 
00212 MeasurePropertyEdit::MeasurePropertyEdit(Measure* m)
00213   : MeasurePropertyBase()
00214       {
00215       measure = m;
00216       QString sho, svo, st;
00217 
00218       hoffset->setText(sho.setNum(measure->userOff().x(), 'g', 3));
00219       voffset->setText(svo.setNum(measure->userOff().y(), 'g', 3));
00220 
00221       int barV, beatV, tickV;
00222       m->score()->sigmap->tickValues(measure->tick(), &barV, &beatV, &tickV);
00223       measureInput->setText(QString("%1").arg(barV));
00224       beatInput->setText(QString("%1").arg(beatV));
00225       tickInput->setText(QString("%1").arg(tickV));
00226       tick->setText(QString("%1").arg(measure->tick()));
00227       tickLen->setText(QString("%1").arg(measure->tickLen()));
00228       }
